meta.description: Optimize the number of small and large teams to maximize the amount of lawn mowed.

sets.name: TEAM_TYPES
sets.description: Types of teams available for lawn mowing

params.name: employees_required
params.description: Number of employees required per team type

params.name: lawn_mowed
params.description: Square feet of lawn mowed per team type

vars.name: num_teams
vars.description: Number of teams of each type

objective.name: max_lawn_mowed
objective.description: Maximize the total amount of lawn mowed

constraints.name: employee_limit
constraints.description: Total number of employees used cannot exceed available employees

constraints.name: small_teams_minimum
constraints.description: At least 10 small teams must be used

constraints.name: large_teams_minimum
constraints.description: At least 6 large teams must be used

constraints.name: small_large_team_ratio
constraints.description: The number of small teams must be at least 3 times the number of large teams
